definitions.definition: A sharpening stone ; a hard stone or piece of synthetically bonded hard minerals that has been formed with at least one flat surface, used to sharpen or hone an edged tool .
Alternative letter-case form of Whetstone ( “ benchmark ” ) .

main_definition: A sharpening stone ; a hard stone or piece of synthetically bonded hard minerals that has been formed with at least one flat surface, used to sharpen or hone an edged tool .
secondary_definitions: ( computing ) Alternative letter-case form of Whetstone ( “ benchmark ” ) .
